function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for multi-hazard threats and incidents, including contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of public safety and health devastation","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive multi-hazard response plans and investing in infrastructure security","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, biometric access control, and advanced communication networks","People":"Public safety and health authorities, infrastructure managers","Owner":"Government agencies, private enterprises"},{"Description":"Inadequate recovery capability in the event of a disruptive event such as a contagious disease outbreak","Impact":"Extended duration of deviation from targeted system performance levels, leading to increased negative impact on public safety and health","Mitigation":"Investing in rapid recovery infrastructure and developing contingency plans for critical services","Technologies":"Emergency response systems, rapid deployment facilities, and crisis management software","People":"Disaster response teams, critical service providers","Owner":"Public and private organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of disciplinary-specific approaches to resilience, including in the context of contagious diseases","Impact":"Inability to address resilience challenges specific to psychology, ecology, and other domains, leading to gaps in preparedness for disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Collaborating with interdisciplinary experts and integrating diverse perspectives in resilience planning","Technologies":"Data analytics, interdisciplinary communication platforms, and knowledge sharing systems","People":"Psychologists, ecologists, and disciplinary experts","Owner":"Research institutions, interdisciplinary organizations"}]}
